channel.title: pink – The Chat Codes Blog
channel.description: For all that is chat related.

item.title: Animated pictures in the Facebook Chat!
item.dc:creator: turbolego
item.description: Today Taher Sellami showed me a new trick that allows us to post animated pictures in tha facebook chat! Check it out in the youtube-video below: Here are some animated pictures found by Revo Ramos: Animated pictures/codes: kitty wearing headphones: … Continue reading →
item.content:encoded:
Today Taher Sellami showed me a new trick that allows us to post animated pictures in tha facebook chat!

Check it out in the youtube-video below:

Here are some animated pictures found by Revo Ramos:

Animated pictures/codes:

kitty wearing headphones: [[126138614064758]]
Full picture: http://www.facebook.com/photo.php?fbid=126138614064758&set=a.125244550820831.21461.123901794288440&type=1

item.title: iPhone/iPad/iPod App!
item.dc:creator: turbolego
item.description: Josh Bitossi, a young developer from Austraila has made the first ever chat-codes related app for iPhone/iPad/iPod! Get it here: http://itunes.apple.com/au/app/facebook-emoticons/id496836592?mt=8 Josh Bitossi’s webpage: http://www.facebooksmileyshq.com/view-all-smileys/ You can see how it works in this video update:
item.content:encoded:
Josh Bitossi, a young developer from Austraila has made the first ever chat-codes related app for iPhone/iPad/iPod!

Get it here:
http://itunes.apple.com/au/app/facebook-emoticons/id496836592?mt=8

Josh Bitossi’s webpage:
http://www.facebooksmileyshq.com/view-all-smileys/

You can see how it works in this video update:

item.title: New Text Generator!
item.dc:creator: turbolego
item.description: You may remember the text-generator by Lars Arne Svanes? Well, that generator is currently down, but fear not! Because the developers behind http://smileyti.me/ has made an alternative: http://smileyti.me/facebook-chat-text-generator/
item.content:encoded:
You may remember the text-generator by Lars Arne Svanes?

Well, that generator is currently down, but fear not! Because the developers behind http://smileyti.me/ has made an alternative:

http://smileyti.me/facebook-chat-text-generator/

item.title: Chat Codes Generator For Sale!
item.dc:creator: turbolego
item.description: Kirill Shulman has decided to sell the chat codes generator http://smileyti.me/ for $15,000.   If you are interested, contact him on facebook:Â TheShulman
item.content:encoded:
Kirill Shulman has decided to sell the chat codes generator http://smileyti.me/ for $15,000.

 

If you are interested, contact him on facebook:Â TheShulman

item.title: Another New Extension!
item.dc:creator: turbolego
item.description: Yesterday “Le Boss” made an extension for the blue smileys thatÂ Taher Sellami made two days ago… Today, Taher Sellami decided to use the sourcecode from the extension by “Le Boss” to make a new extension for a new set of … Continue reading →
item.content:encoded:
Yesterday “Le Boss” made an extension for the blue smileys thatÂ Taher Sellami made two days ago…

Today, Taher Sellami decided to use the sourcecode from the extension by “Le Boss” to make a new extension for a new set of PINK smileys!

Download here:
http://userscripts.org/scripts/show/128852

Bug reports:Â spistek@yahoo.fr

The picture to the right shows all the three extensions that are available right now, the download link is for the Pink smiley extension ONLY.

If you just want one or two extensions, just disable or uninstall them.
